name: Malia 2D
description:
One of the most difficult adventure / action indie game created. Test your reflexes my dodging enemy's bullet by jumping. Levels there are small but difficult, are you even sure that you can pass the first level ....... 

Explore the difficult adventure of Malia

DEVELOPMENT

Malia 2d is still in development please send us your feedback through comments so as help me to improve this game. Thanks for your help ( wherther good or bad your feedback is, it will help me improve this game )

  • This game does not contain Ads

¿ HOW CAN YOU HELP ?

  • By purchasing the game
  • Seed feedbacks
  • Share to your friends

 ¡Thanks ! :-)
